Rank Up With Video SEO Services

Level Up Preview text Videos on YouTube and Google

What Are Video SEO Services?

YouTube SEO Specialist and Consultant to Help You Rank Higher.

YouTube, Video SEO, and Marketing are just as essential as any other form of SEO services.  And guess what? YouTube is the #2 most popular search engine, only behind Google (which owns YouTube). Helpful videos now appear on the first page of Google if executed correctly. So, if you’ve been struggling to rank organically with specific keywords, you still may be able to rank on Google’s first page in the form of a good video.

Expect to rank up with MetricsMule as your video SEO partner.

Video SEO Services

Optimizing your videos to get found on Google and YouTube, and know how to implement keywod research strategies.

Google vs. YouTube

Completely different in search results. A keyword that gets 200k searches in one may only get 50 searches in the other. 

YouTube SEO Services

Strategically choosing your keywords, creating engaging thumbnails and helpful content, utilizing valuable resources.

What’s changed regarding Video SEO?

The last few years have seen a big change. Google is placing a big emphasis on video and allowing the best, most informative, and helpful videos to rank on the first page of search results. Try it and see. When you perform a search with “how to” in the phrase you’ll notice that search engines highlight the most helpful videos. And what’s the saying? A photo speaks a thousand words. Well, in today’s standards, we feel a video speaks 10,000 words.

Schedule a 30 minute call

Not only can we optimze your video for SEO…

We can create, edit, post, and manage or create your YouTube channel. With all the keyword research tools and data analysis resources, we know exactly how to get you discovered and ranked. And when it comes to creating and editing your videos, no one knows more. From promos and advertisements to live streams and podcasts or how-to and informative videos, we do it all. 

See more

Rank your videos on search engines like Google and YouTube.

Did you know that YouTube is the 2nd largest online search engine? It’s only behind Google, which also owns YouTube. So if you have an important message to share, your video needs eyes to find it. You’ll have your videos appear organically in online search results, video search results, and in YouTube search results. But your content needs to be good, and that’s exactly what we’ll help you do. We’ll create your videos, get them ranked, embed them on your website, and can even manage your YouTube channel to ensure you stay visible.

Why video marketing and SEO is so powerful

Watch your website, blog post, or video JUMP up in rankings!

  • 1st Page

    Appear on the 1st page for Google Search Results with a well-done video. 

  • YouTube

    Having many views on YouTube helps you improve your Google Organic rankings. 

  • Google Search

    Google owns YouTube. So when you Google Video Search, your chances of appearing are improved. 

  • On-Page SEO

    Incorporate your videos in your blog posts to improve your on-page SEO. 

  • VLOG page

    Add a VLOG page to your website showcasing all of your YouTube videos. 

  • Engagement

    Having well-made videos on your website encourages your customers to engage with you more and improves trust.

Ranking Factors for Video SEO

Appear on the 1st page in the Google Video Search results. When your video marketing is executed correctly with high-quality videos and proper search engine optimization, you’ll climb the rankings, too. 

Here are three ranking factors: 

  1. High-quality videos
  2. Well-designed video thumbnails
  3. Relevant video content for your targeted audience

Search Engine Optimization

Successful SEO strategies with targeted keywords, long-tail keywords, and secondary keywords. In these two images, notice how our client dominates the first page of the Google Video results page regardless of the different keyword variations. 

Helpful Tips for Video SEO

Here are a few tips to get you started.

Content

Is your video content something people will find helpful, like how-to videos? Make your video content useful for consumers and the SEO will follow. 

YouTube

Do you have a YouTube channel? Every created video should be uploaded to your channel. Then simply embed each video on your website.

Keywords

Discover important long-tail keywords that help you rank in the search results. Long-tail example: “How to grill a medium temperature ribeye steak.”

Competitors

Are your competitors creating videos? How do they rank? If so, find out what keywords they use and make your video content better than theirs.

There are many other ranking factors regarding YouTube searches and Google Video searches. Although Google owns YouTube, the two algorithms are quite different. Here are some examples of how YouTube spends time learning about your audience.

  • What they watch
  • How many views your video gets
  • Average view duration
  • Impressions click-through rate
  • Ranking by views
